column1: Baguim do Monte is a civil parish in the municipality of Gondomar
column2: Portugal. It was formed on July 11
column4: by disintegration of territories of the parish of Rio Tinto. The population in 2011 was 14
column6: in an area of 5.46 km². Together with the neighboring parish of Rio Tinto
column7: it integrates the city of Rio Tinto.
